arts.ttl: “Gave me goosebumps” – Mittelstädt hails Stuttgart's home support after win over Gladbach
arts.sum: Maximilian Mittelstädt praised the home crowd at the MHPArena after Stuttgart secured their first Bundesliga win of the season against Borussia Mönchengladbach.

arts.ttl: Chema Andrés heads Stuttgart to a narrow victory over Gladbach
arts.sum: VfB Stuttgart secured a 1-0 victory over Borussia Mönchengladbach on Matchday 2 thanks to Chema Andrés' late header, with the hosts having to ride their luck at times after an impressive away performance from Gerardo Seoane's men, which ultimately went unrewarded. Franck Honorat was a constant threat for Gladbach but couldn't find a way past Alexander Nübel in the Stuttgart goal.

arts.ttl: Woltemade absence no obstacle as Stuttgart beat Gladbach
arts.sum: VfB Stuttgart responded well to the loss of star striker Nick Woltemade, claiming a 1-0 win over Borussia Mönchengladbach.

arts.ttl: VfB Stuttgart vs. Borussia Mönchengladbach preview: Winless sides look for first three points
arts.sum: VfB Stuttgart welcome Borussia Mönchengladbach to MHPArena on Saturday afternoon as both sides are looking for their first win of the 2025/26 Bundesliga season.
